name: Meteoric Shower
description:
Back of Box - ColecoVision (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

PG 903

STAY AND LOOK AT MY SHORT FLASHING LIFE IN THE SKY. AREN'T WE BOTH AWAITING THE DAWN? WANDERER. I WOULD THANK YOU FOR FREEING ME FROM MY WORLDLY BODY AND RETURN TO THE ETERNITY. I HAVE ATTENDED THIS SELF-BANISHMENT UNWILLINGLY. SO, COME AND SHOOT. YOU WILL BE HELPING ME TO MY ETERNAL PLANET.
